articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Everything we know about Namor, Black Panther 2’s villain from SDCC 2022
articles.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’s apparent villain Namor is one of the oldest characters in the whole Marvel universe, which means he’s got plenty of history, even if we don’t know his role in the movie just yet.
articles.content: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever finally has a new trailer and its full of familiar faces and new heroes. But the footage, released during Marvels panel at San Diego Comic-Con 2022, only teased the mov… [+3436 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: SDCC 2022: Daredevil arrives in MCU in Disney Plus series Daredevil: Born Again
articles.description: Charlie Cox and Vincent D’Onofrio will return as Daredevil and Kingpin in a new MCU-set series starring The Man Without Fear, Marvel Studios announced in their Hall H panel at SDCC 2022.
articles.content:
After cameos in Spider-Man: No Way Home, Daredevil will once again roam the streets of Hells Kitchen in a new series coming to Disney Plus.

articles.title: Ironheart makes MCU debut at SDCC 2022 in first Black Panther 2 trailer
articles.description: Iron Man protege Riri Williams is Ironheart in a new Disney Plus series and Black Panther: Wakanda Forever. At SDCC 2022, Marvel Studios debuts Dominique Thorne as the superhero Ironheart.

articles.title: Black Panther 2 trailer gives the first glimps of Namor at SDCC 2022
articles.description: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’s first trailer reveals the identity of the next Black Panther and more. The movie is set to release on Nov. 11.

articles.description: Kevin Feige announced the new slate of MCU movies and TV shows at San Diego Comic-Con, with the unveiling of Phase 5, incuding new Ant-Man, Daredevil, and Blade.

articles.title: SDCC 2022: Marvel reveals first Fantastic Four details
articles.description: Marvel shares the first real details about its forthcoming Fantastic Four movie following the departure of Spider-Man: Far From Home director Jon Watts. The movie will bring Marvel’s First Family into the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
